Entries.schoolReady: @,^^I want to thank you again for accepting the school project. I'm very fast, so everything is ready! Hehehe...^^Meet me at the Town to attend the inauguration.^^- Robin.
Entries.schoolDirector: @, do you believe that we did not think about who would be the Principal of our School? Well, I would like to invite you to participate in our routines.^^It is not very complicated, because I know you already have a lot of work on the farm.^^You are amazing!^^- Penny.
